headline: Ameriprise Financial Appoints Glynis A. Bryan to Board of Directors
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, February 20, 2025--Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) today announced that Ms. Glynis A. Bryan has been appointed to its board of directors, effective March 1, 2025.
